name: Pactman
description:
Pactman is Pac-Man reimagined as a first-person horror game for the PS1. Created by a single developer for SCREAM JAM 2020. 

Immerse yourself in a world of terror as you explore, collect tome pages, and try to complete the ritual before the spirits that roam the halls claim you.

Featuring cutting edge visuals and sounds for 1995.

Instructions and Controls:

W/A/S/D - Move forward, back, left, and right

Mouse - Look around

Shift - Sprint

ESC - Quit game

Batteries superpower your flashlight, allowing you to fend off ghosts for a short time.

Fruit restores your stamina, allowing you to sprint for longer before getting tired.

Collect all the pages and the key in order to enter the locked chamber and complete the ritual.
